post:
Spoilt Host
http://www.spoilthost.com

Spoilt Host is proud to launch its VPS Hosting Plans! Our plans are very ideal for Linux gurus who do not need OS related support. Nonetheless, we still offer a server management option to accomodate the others who are not experts at Linux (at the moment this is only available for VPSes with cPanel/WHM).

All of our VPS plans feature:

HyperVM control panel
Powered by OpenVZ
30 day money back guarantee
99.9% uptime guarantee
24/7 Support
Root Access
Free Daily Backups
1 IP address*
CentOS 4 Operating System
99.9% Uptime Guarantee
100% Self Managed**
*2 IP addresses will be allocated if you purchase a control panel
**100% Self Managed if no server management is purchased

~~If you have any questions then please feel free to contact our Sales Department using the contact information below~~
